content: Stream created by Grahame Grieve.
ok @Boonchai Kijsanayotin over to you to invite thai friends to join us here
Grahame Grieve renamed stream thailand (ประเทศไทย) to ประเทศไทย (thailand).

Thanks! Grahame. Your presentation at the meeting help stimulate the awareness and engagement of health data standards in Thailand. Hello Elliot, I didn't attend the DICOM educational conference, but some of my colleagues did. Next time when you come to BKK please let us know
